items.abstract: Synthesized for the first time, a LiTDPI salt in EC : DMC (1 : 2) was tested as a lithium conducting electrolyte and it showed high ionic conductivity, a high lithium transference number and a good cycling performance.
title: An imidazopyrazine-derived anion for lithium conducting electrolyte application
